name: Yvette Graham
content: Yvette Graham Yvette Graham Yvette Graham Associate Professor in Artificial Intelligence School of Computer Science and Statistics Trinity College Dublin Email: ygraham AT tcd DOT ie Office: G.38, O'Reilly Building, TCD Teaching:CSU34041 Information Management II (see TCD Blackboard) CS7IS3 Information Retrieval and Web Search (see TCD Blackboard) Directorship: ICS Integrated Computer Science Contact Course Director Form Supervision: Naushad Alam (current PhD) Jiawen Lyn (current PhD) Rameez Qureshi (current PhD) Islam Ahmed (current PhD) Sami Ul Haq (current PhD) Alok Debnath (current PhD) Nitika Mathur (completed MSc 2013) Koel Dutta Chowdhury (completed MSc 2019) Florian Hanke (completed PhD 2014) Tianbo Ji (completed PhD 2022) Chenyang Lyu (completed 2023) Luis Lebron Casas (completed 2023) Alan Cowap (completed PhD 2024) Publications: I am author of 100+ NLP publications. Please seee my Google scholar profile for the most comprehensive list. Google Scholar Pdf and Bibtex (up to year 2020) Funding: DCT Strand Lead in the Science Foundation Ireland ADAPT Research Centre Dialogue Evaluation Project (SFI Huawei Cofunded Project) NIST Image Captioning Evaluation Project Enterprise Ireland Software: NLP Evaluation Software: My Github Repository Deep Syntax SMT Software: old DCU homepage
